result.execSummary:
The defendant Kirk Toman Lloyd #73986 was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Manuf/Deliver Amphetamine(<=3g) [Modifiers: Penalties for Felonies-Class "F" Felony], a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(e)1.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Defendant to report to Probation today March 25, 2016 by 2:30 p.m.
Defendant is entitled to 47 days credit under 973.0155.

 
In the event that the defendant is revoked or discharged from either probation or extended supervision with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent shall notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge.  A civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victim(s) and/or governmental entities for any balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.

miscConds.notes:
Apply bond on file.
DNA surcharge.
Psychological/Psychiatric Evaluation within 30 days if requested by Agent and follow through with all recommendations.

-Defendant to submit a DNA sample.
-Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia.
-Not to enter any business or establishment where the primary purpose is sale of alcohol.
-Not to operate a motor vehicle without a valid drivers license.
-NO CONTACT whatsoever with S.A.S. dob 6/30/1993.
-Follow all rules and regulations of Agent.
-Subject to random UA's and PBT's.
-Pay Supervision fees.
AODA within 60 days and follow any recommended treatment.

-Huber granted for employment and treatment.

CO: Vlack, DAR: Gross, Clerk: Rohan, ADA:  Edward Minser   DF ATTY:  T Gregory Amann   DF:  Kirk Toman Lloyd appeared. Case called at 1:08 pm. ADA Minser and Atty. Amann have no corrections to PSI. ADA Minser requests court follow recommendations of PSI. ADA Minser requests no contact with SAS dob 6/30/93. Atty. Amann responds. Kirk Lloyd addresses Court. Court questions DEF. Court Orders:
Sent W/H, 4 years probation with conditions:
- 240 days jail, 180 days stayed
- 60 day sentence to be served beginning 5/20/16 at 4:30 pm, sentence may be served in St. Croix County jail or alternate county, if Sheriff's in both counties agree in writing

- Huber granted for employment and treatment
- AODA within 60 days and follow any recommended treatment
- Psychiatric/psycological evaluation within 30 days if requested by agent and follow through with recommendations
- Submit DNA sample and pay surcharge
- Only use prescription medications if prescribed
-  Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia.
- Not to enter any business or establishment where the primary purpose is sale of alcohol.
- No posession of firearms
-  Not to operate a motor vehicle without a valid drivers license.
- NO CONTACT whatsoever with S.A.S. dob 6/30/93.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person. 
- DEF to report to probation by 2:30 pm 3/25/16
- Follow rules/regulations of agent
- Subject to random UA and PBT
- DNA surcharge $250
- Court costs $268
- DEF is entitled to 47 days credit under 973.015
 Probation review hearing scheduled for June 24, 2016 at 03:00 pm.
Sentencing hearing on March 25, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

and_X_ SIGNATURE BOND:   __ Defendant and/or  __ Surety
guarantees compliance with the terms of this bond by pledging $7000.00
and understands that if the defendant does not comply with the terms of this bond, the bond will be forfeited and the defendant and/or surety may be ordered to pay the amount of the bond.

  It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, S.A.S.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.
